name: dreamcatcher (Tweeble)
description:
you're trying to complete your collection in your favorite gameboi game but your parents keep checking in on you since it is already bedtime and they want to make sure you are sleeping. 

can you catch them all without getting caught yourself?

made by team tweeble, a small indie team, making cute, edgy and experimental games weekly to bi-weekly.

check out our twitter: @tweeble_me and while you're at it, feel free to listen to our podcast and the soundtrack on soundcloud.
